scripts.build: npm run build-data-dictionary && npm run build-scan && npm run build-audit && npm run build-swaggerui && npm run build-redoc
scripts.build-data-dictionary: cd data-dictionary && npm run build && mkdirp ../../webview/generated/data-dictionary && cpy --flat dist/* ../../webview/generated/data-dictionary
scripts.build-scan: cd scan && npm run build && mkdirp ../../webview/generated/scan && cpy --flat dist/* ../../webview/generated/scan
scripts.build-audit: cd audit && npm run build && mkdirp ../../webview/generated/audit && cpy --flat dist/* ../../webview/generated/audit
scripts.build-swaggerui: cd preview-swaggerui && npm run build && mkdirp ../../webview/generated/preview/swaggerui && cpy --flat dist/* ../../webview/generated/preview/swaggerui
scripts.build-redoc: cd preview-redoc && npm run build && mkdirp ../../webview/generated/preview/redoc && cpy --flat dist/* ../../webview/generated/preview/redoc
